overview: Although this film does not follow the genre of the city portrait in any way whatsoever, it nonetheless presents a documentation of the filmmakerÂ´s sojourn in Rome. The starting point is relicts of an empire already ruled by a culture of travel and by tourism, its centuries-old structures; their monumentality, ambivalent beauty, transience, and omnipresent, ornamental grotesqueness. (Rike Frank)
title: In Rome
